result.reason: Issue title mentions OTP support but provides no body/details — unclear if this means TOTP/HOTP auto-fill for SSH/RDP sessions, integration with an authenticator app, or a password field that clears after use.
result.approach: Clarify scope: (1) TOTP auto-type for SSH keyboard-interactive auth, (2) OTP field in connection properties that clears after use, or (3) integration with external OTP provider; then implement accordingly in credential/connection layer
